overpay.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to pay someone more money than they deserve
overpay.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Most big companies continue to overpay their top executives.
overpay.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to pay too much money for something
overpay.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Try to recover any tax you have overpaid.
overpay.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to pay someone more than they deserve or are owed
overpay.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The effect of the tax change is that a lot of people will overpay and will then have to claim refunds.
The Pentagon claims the two defense firms were overpaid by more than $1.3 billion over the years.
overpay.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to pay too much for something in relation to its real value
overpay.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Did we overpay for the company? The price was probably on the high side.
